body: The object gains +5 feet of reach with one melee attack. Increase reach on all attacks for an additional +1 CP.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Building and Modifying Constructs/Building and Modifying Constructs/New Animated Object Abilities/Exceptional Reach (Ex/1 CP)
name: Exceptional Reach (Ex, 1 CP)
